channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: GOP candidate concedes race to Democratic US Rep Don Davis in NC’s 1st Congressional District
item.description: The Republican challenger has conceded after a close contest for North Carolina’s only toss-up congressional district.

item.title: New maps help Wisconsin Democrats make legislative gains and set up a push for majorities in 2026
item.description: New legislative district boundaries didn’t pay off quite as well as Wisconsin Democrats hoped for in Tuesday’s elections.

item.title: 1 of 2 Democratic prosecutors removed by DeSantis in Florida wins back old job
item.description: One of two Democratic state attorneys in Florida who Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis removed from office in what opponents say were political moves won back their old job from voters.
